results.description: The Spanish Super Cup tournament will be played in Saudi Arabia in January 2020, the national football association (RFEF) says.

results.description: Lionel Messi scores two goals and provides two assists as Barcelona thrash Real Valladolid to return to the top of La Liga.

results.title: Barcelona 5-1 Real Valladolid: Lionel Messi scores twice as Barca return to the top

results.description: Barcelona are fined 300 euros (£265) by the Spanish Football Federation for their approach of Antoine Griezmann while at La Liga rivals Atletico Madrid.
